mapper.select: SELECT stock_code as stockCode, max( trading_day ) as tradingDay, count( * ) as counter FROM T_Stock_Limit where trading_day between #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY stock_code HAVING counter > 1 ORDER BY counter DESC, max( trading_day ) desc

SELECT t.stock_code, count(t.id) AS counter FROM T_Stock_Limit AS l JOIN T_transaction_stock AS t ON l.stock_code = t.stock_code WHERE l.trading_day = #{currentDate} AND t.trading_day BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY t.stock_code ORDER BY counter desc
